title: Shenmue I & II
notes: The launcher requires .NET, which isn't installed by default. Can be worked around in regular Wine (with DXVK) by running the game's executable(s) directly, but there are additional audio problems.

title: Shenmue I & II
notes: Claims that the game needs to be updated, but there is no update available

Launch the game from Steam with the option "PROTON_DUMP_DEBUG_COMMANDS=1 %command%". Go to "/tmp/proton_$USER/" and move the "run" script to your home dir. Edit it to bypass the launcher (first two lines, point to "sm1/Shenmue.exe" instead or "sm2/Shenmue2.exe") and add ";xaudio2_7=n,b" to the "WINEDLLOVERRIDES" line. I also had to add the line "PULSE_LATENCY_MSEC=30" to solve audio crackling. Re-add the script to Steam as a non-steam game.
title: Shenmue I & II
